text: @Mike_Pence @SecAzar @WhiteHouse You, @realDonaldTrump & all your flunkies have f**ked it all up w/the COVID-19 response. You know very well that there should have been an all-out federal response to the pandemic instead of leaving it to the individual states to handle it. We should've all been on the same page.
